msbt.message: Tonight's finally the super important New Year's Eve Countdown!I don't wanna fall asleep before the Countdown, so I'm gonna eat lotsa snacks! Chewing will keep me awake!
Tonight's the Countdown! It's the last party of the year!And then? It's New Year's Day and a whole new year of snacks begins!
Tonight's finally the Countdown! I'm a little nervous, a huh huh huh!Help me outâ€”is it "Three! Two! One!" or "Three! Two! One! Zero!" before we all shout, "Happy New Year!"? I don't wanna mess up!
The Countdown is the last party of the year, so everybody goes all out!Sometimes I get hungry at these things. So I stuff my pockets with hot pizza before I leave home!
